answers.answer: Take a look at this web page on Diabetic Neuropathies and see if the symptoms are like yours http://diabetes.niddk.nih.gov/dm/pubs/neuropathies/  If yes, then ask to see an Endocrinologist.  An Endocrinologist is a specially trained doctor on diabetic care and treatment. They know how to treat conditions that are often complex and involve many systems within your body such as nerve damage in the feet.
